feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.12: Switch to Rack::Attack for Throttling
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • Switch to Rack::Attack for Throttling (#2324) @pglombardo
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.950.0 to 1.951.0 (#2323) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.39.0 to 1.39.1 (#2320) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.4 to 3.1.6 (#2319) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.200.0 to 3.201.0 (#2318) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.155.0 to 1.156.0 (#2316) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.949.0 to 1.950.0 (#2315) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.41.12

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.14: Add Link to new Docs Portal
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

Password Pusher has a new documentation portal available at:

https://docs.pwpush.com

:rocket: Features

  • Add Documentation Link (#2327) @pglombardo

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.42.2: Localhost Email Fix
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Email: Authentication nil by default (#2361) @pglombardo
  • Update Robots.txt generator (#2356) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.5 to 2.0.6 (#2359) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump apipie-rails from 1.4.0 to 1.4.2 (#2358) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump ruby-statistics from 3.0.2 to 4.0.0 (#2321) @dependabot
  • Remove Flag Icons Set (#2357) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush
